程序包 cn.wuqinxuan.numbercruncher.graphutils

类 GraphPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • cn.wuqinxuan.numbercruncher.graphutils.GraphPanel
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DemoPanel
    直接已知子类:
    BifurcationPanel, BuffonPanel, JuliaSetPanel, MandelbrotSetPanel, NewtonsFractalPanel, PrimePatternsPanel, RandomExponentialPanel, RandomNormalPanel, RootFinderPanel, SolveDiffEqPanel, UserPointPanel

    public abstract class GraphPanel
extends java.awt.Panel
implements DemoPanel
    The base panel for all graph demo panels.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • GraphPanel

        protected GraphPanel​(Plottable[] functions,
                     PlotProperties plotProps,
                     boolean xorMode,
                     boolean drawXequalsY)
        Constructor.
        参数:
        functions - the array of plottable functions
        plotProps - the plot properties
        xorMode - if true, set XOR mode
        drawXequalsY - if true, draw the X=Y line

      • GraphPanel

        protected GraphPanel​(java.lang.String headerText,
                     PlotProperties plotProps,
                     boolean drawAxes)
        Constructor.
        参数:
        headerText - the text to display in the header panel
        plotProps - the plot properties
        drawAxes - if true, draw axes

        protected void plotLine​(int x1,
                        int y1,
                        int x2,
                        int y2,
                        java.awt.Color color)
        Plot a line.
        参数:
        x1 - the x-coordinate of one end of the line
        y1 - the y-coordinate of one end of the line
        x2 - the x-coordinate of the other end of the line
        y2 - the y-coordinate of the other end of the line
        color - the line color

      • plotLines

        protected void plotLines​(int[] xs1,
                         int[] ys1,
                         int[] xs2,
                         int[] ys2,
                         int k,
                         java.awt.Color color)
        Plot multiple lines.
        参数:
        xs1 - the array of x-coordinates of one end of the lines
        ys1 - the array of y-coordinates of one end of the lines
        xs2 - the array of x-coordinates of the other end of the lines
        ys2 - the array of y-coordinates of the other end of the lines
        color - the color of the lines

        color - the rectangle color
